website_summaries.verdict: A traditionally designed Moses basket with detachable hood. Made from quality hand-woven maize, it features a foam mattress pad and sheet.
pros: Hand-woven maize basket that is durable and built to last
Handles are woven to the full depth of the basket for extra security
Included mattress has 100 percent polyester filling for extra comfort
Detachable hood is easy to remove and re-attach
cons: Some buyers say the build is too flimsy and not sturdy enough

customer_reviews.title: What a joke
customer_reviews.text: The "hood" comes separate and is attached to the basket with velcro that is whip-stitched on to the separate pieces. The slightest movement or pressure causes the hood to detach. It is so tacky. The ribbon, which I was going to cut off anyway, is not wide and nice like in the photos, but thin and plasticky. The basket is constructed in such a way that the basket would aways slant to one side, as the bottom of the basket only has a nice base on one side. I didn't expect a high quality basket for this price, but this is unusable. PS it's too small for a Dock-a-tot. Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: M. Leininger

customer_reviews.title: I wish there were a way to make the lace ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were a way to make the lace stand up as it is styled in the picture. Instead, it droops into the basket. Meh. Even more, I wish this came with at least 3 sheets. They are so tiny, I accidentally mistook the sheet for trash and then (after searching the entire house!), found it IN the trashcan. Perhaps if they were a different color? Regardless, more sheets would cost the company little, and wouldn't force you to discontinue use of the basket while washing the ONE sheet. The price was right, but that little thing would bring so much more VALUE!
customer_reviews.author: T.A.P.S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: great quality , I have gotten a lot of compliments on it. My daughter loves it and I love the fact that it's portable anytime we go to a family function or going somewhere overnight I can bring it along for naps. It's just very easy and functional. Also I got an "already opened box" in the color I wanted for about 25$ so it was definitely worth it, I would have been willing to pay full price especially with the amount of use it has gotten.
customer_reviews.author: nicole corin

customer_reviews.title: Not for human babies!
customer_reviews.text: It was 9" wide. It was crappy workman ship. I was going to use it to stabilize the sides of a mosses basket I crocheted for my grandbaby. But it is too narrow for anything other than a doll.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! made of natural materials
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! made of natural materials! Looks exactly as in picture! Very beautiful! As our daughter yet is not born, we have put heavy things in the basket to check its durability: seems very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Lizaveta

customer_reviews.title: Vintage look
customer_reviews.text: This item is such a great value. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift! For the baby and for her dolls in the future!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome gift! So glad I ordered it for a little premie girl to enjoy herself and then later to play with her dolls. This is for laying on the floor and cuddling your baby.. Great on the go or in the room with you. IT's NOT meant to be "sturdy" or to carry your baby - it's perfect for what it's intended. I also washed cover/sheet and dried with Dreft and it did fine. However, I think you'll probably end up using a thinker receiving blanket as the "sheet" in everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Adorable basket! Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: We used it for a reborn life size baby doll, but are very impressed with the basket quality. Nice size and very sturdy with handles. Very well made and so cute! Perfect for a newborn!
customer_reviews.author: The Review

customer_reviews.title: Great basket, Low price.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the reviews, I was a little hesitant to order this basket. I am very pleased with my purchase. It is a soft basket, but it is sturdy in the rocker we purchased to go with it. I flipped the bumpers over so the scalloped edges cover the bows. I think it makes it look a lot better. We will definitely use this in our daughter's nursery to hold blankets and stuffed animals once she switches over to her crib. This is a great basket for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The pad is thick enough and my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The pad is thick enough and my grand daughter sleeps well in it. The liner is not an exact fit but it works. My daughter did express concern that the baby could lay up against it and block her airway. But, that is a concern with any crib liner. The hood fits well but is more for looks than shade. You are not supposed to carry the baby in it but I did from the living room to bedroom and it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute portable baby bed
customer_reviews.text: Very cute basket to put baby in for a nap nearby. Safer than putting baby on a blanket on the floor. Lightweight so it's easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed for 24 inch baby dolls
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a large baby doll and it is perfect. Well made and not to pricy. Thinking about buying one for a friend's doll
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I love this moses basket! I wish I had one for my first two children. I'm still awaiting my new born, but I can already see that it will come in handy. I'll be able to lay my baby down where ever I'm at--bathtime, bedtime stories, at relatives homes, etc. He'll always have a comfy and safe place to sleep. I put a mattress pad under the sheet to make it a little more comfy. The white velcro shows on the outside, but who cares, it's function I'm looking for and not appearance. We shall see how he likes it when he's born.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: A life saver!
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely beautiful and perfect for our baby. We ordered this item to help her learn how to sleep in her crib and to prevent from sleeping with the baby. We put this basket on the bed between us and she loves it. It's convenient and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: This product is not safe for any baby
customer_reviews.text: This Moses basket came in a smashed box. The basket itself was misshapened and would not sit straight. One side tipped so far down that if I were to put and infant in it they would slip out the side. The quality of the grass read was coming apart in several places. The Velcro was ruff and to put the top on was a joke. The top was flat and would not attach to the curve of the basket even with the Velcro. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Harris

customer_reviews.title: Moses Basket  AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this along with the stand for my daughter. She has loved this item. She can carry this with her anywhere and has a bassinet for the baby. Easy to put beside the bed, easy to carry to grandparents house ( :D ) very light weight and durable. Too bad the baby won't be able to use it more than 2 to 3 months. After that she'll be too long. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: J S.

customer_reviews.title: The gift was loved.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten any other feedback from the giftee. The baby is due in 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Badger Basket w/sage gingham bedding
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble even giving this a full star. What a piece of garbage! The hood did not stay in place with the velcro and the bedding looked so dirty. Unfortunately, I now had no time to shop for something else for a shower, so I asked a friend if she could help me. we lined it with a beautiful material and looped bows thru the basket and the hood to keep it in place. It looked fabulous, but cost me another $50, but i would have been much too embarrassed to present the original basket as a gift. look elsewhere if you are looking for a basket.
customer_reviews.author: TSM

customer_reviews.title: I love this basket
customer_reviews.text: We are still using it a month in for our newborn. It is the resident living room Moses basket. Adore!
customer_reviews.author: Janyl Ramírez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful basket, love the eyelet trim
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful basket, love the eyelet trim. I also bought a stand for it and used it for a newborn photo shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J Palazzo

customer_reviews.title: Not
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. My baby is only 2 months old & I just noticed the basket is already unraveling. Looked to find a place to contact seller to see what we could do about exchanging this unsafe item. Unable to find any contact info. Also shows window for return has expired. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Difference is the hood is attached by Velcro rather than "hook & key" tape... whether that's just a more attractive way for the company to say Velcro. Overall it's a bit tacky. Good from far.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Cute and basic Moses basket, quality buy
customer_reviews.text: Cute bassinet that seems to be constructed well enough for a baby to sleep in it for a few months. The box it came in seems to have smashed the basket a bit, so we had to spend some time reshaping it when we assembled it. The hood is attached by Velcro but seems pretty secure. It's nice that you can remove it if you want. Can't wait to put our baby in this.
customer_reviews.author: kimmyp

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED BENT OUT OF SHAPE/CHEAPLY MADE!
customer_reviews.text: This is cheaply made and came all bent up...so badly that my husband and I could not get it to shape right. Ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: PreciselyThere

customer_reviews.title: So sweet
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a baby shower....they parents to be loved it! This basket is so sweet and would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: gina damuth

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for real baby
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to get this. It came distorted from original shape and is not suitable for a real baby. Even in perfect shape this item is not suitable for a baby. It’s pretty in the pictures . The white lining does not stand up properly like in the stock photo and like another review said the liner by the baby’s head could flop over on The baby’s face
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Weighill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute
customer_reviews.text: It's ok good for dolls not sure how it would be for a baby 😁
customer_reviews.author: Snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for mommy to be
customer_reviews.text: Such a good looking basket and I know we'll use it as long as we can!
customer_reviews.author: Bookwormjude

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Great product...well made. Ordered it by mistake and sent it back.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Using with our newborn. After a couple of weeks, one side is slightly lopping over lol! Don't know how else to describe it!
customer_reviews.author: Nayana

customer_reviews.title: It made a great presentation. It's a little smaller than what I ...
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a Moses basket for my own three but never got one, so I got one for my first granddaughter due this August. I filled it up with smaller gifts and pink tissue paper and wrapped it in clear cellophane and added a big pink ribbon. It made a great presentation. It's a little smaller than what I expected, but I love it just the same.
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: Moses Basket
customer_reviews.text: The Moses basket is beutiful. I gave this as a baby shower gift. I learned from experience how helpful having a Moses basket is with a new born. You can put the baby next to you in bed and the basket keeps them safe from rolling over and it's great when your little one is asleep, you need not wake them. Just grab the handles and go, and it is nice for the decore.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborn
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the first 3 months. Lightweight but strong and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: cant beat the price
customer_reviews.text: we bought this to use over at my grandparents house, since our 4 week old daughter is used to sleeping in the moses basket at our house. It's a great value, solid product and defintely worth it for the price. yes, it's only used for a short ammount of time, but we plan to keep it in our daughters room and let her use it for her baby dolls when she grows up :o)
customer_reviews.author: emily magana

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Even though we didn't need this item it worked out well for us. It shipped quicker than expected, it's lite weight and it's easy to store for baby #2. Our baby only used it for a couple weeks, but it's so cute that we used it in our newborn photo shoot- it was very convenient to have!!!
customer_reviews.author: citygirl23

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but the workmanship is a bit shoddy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but the workmanship is a bit shoddy. There are occasional sharp pieces sticking out of the side of the basket. Also I had to cut a piece of cardboard to the size of the mattress as the bottom sags. Now with the cardboard underneath, it is very pretty and my little granddaughter sleeps like a 'baby' in it.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my daughter was a couple weeks old. I had a hard time getting her to nap/sleep anywhere except my arms, but she did nap many times in this adorable basket. The only con I would say is that the handles are pointless, and I never used the hood. Now at 4 months old she's probably too big for it but we've been using it as a one-stop place for toys, diapers, ointments, burp cloths, etc. etc. It is VERY cute no matter how you use it!
customer_reviews.author: AmyT44

customer_reviews.title: Came Apart at the seams
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and the material was already starting to unravel. Baby has been in it for three weeks and the whole side handle has come off and the front of the base has broken. It doesn't seem well made or sturdy enough. Cute idea.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Moses Basket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this when my great grandson came to Texas for a visit. His parents were coming for a wedding but I would have a time when they were visitng my home. They would need a small basket for him to rest in as he was only seven months old. This was such a cute Moses basket with a green check lining and soft pad. This was also so reasonable and I will have it available when any more new great grandbabies come to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Letta Meinen

customer_reviews.title: I love these. This one is try pretty with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. This one is try pretty with the gingham fabric. I gave it to my daughter filled with other stuff at her baby shower. She's using it to store stuffed animals and small toys, which it's also great for once baby gets a bit bigger. One of the most practical thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: SaintRoch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little basket
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little basket! I'm using it as part of a nursery display in my art store and I keep getting customers wanting to by it!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hungerford

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who intended on using it to display a fancy doll. The bassinet came with broken wicker in multiple spots and a flimsy over-the-head piece that drooped into the basket. It's a pain to return too. Requires a giant box. Quick edit: the company was nice about the return process. I upped the review to 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: easy to attach the bedding and hood
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, easy to attach the bedding and hood. thank you
customer_reviews.author: anni

customer_reviews.title: He likes it
customer_reviews.text: After eight days of usage I come to the conclusion, that our little one likes the basket. We like it, too, as it is easy to carry around and fits in every corner. There is nothing I could think of that is not right with the Badger Basket.
customer_reviews.author: JanA

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: gave as gift to daughter and she politely asked if she could return
customer_reviews.author: Angela J.L

customer_reviews.title: Pros: Size and Price; Cons: Smell and Sheet Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, price and lightweight aspect of the Badger Basket. However, I regret purchasing it because the natural material it is made of has a strong smell that I didn't want my baby to have to sleep with and the gingham bedding fell apart after the FIRST wash and dry. It came out in stringy shreds. I recommend that you do NOT tumble dry the bedding, and possibly you'll have more success with it. I wish the company would make higher quality bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Alison C. Skjei

customer_reviews.title: This was absolutely PERFECT! The price was awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely PERFECT! The price was awesome. I bought it for my daughter's reborn babies. It was way less expensive than any doll carrier or bassinet I found! Great for twin baby girls!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2 months old and it has started unravelling. It was cheap - so I'm not too upset that it's not durable and won't last for another baby.
customer_reviews.author: Nusi

customer_reviews.title: I brought this basket to take some adorable newborn photos of our first grand daughter
customer_reviews.text: I brought this basket to take some adorable newborn photos of our first grand daughter. I would only use the basket as a photo prop for newborn photos but never use it as a bed for a baby to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So sweet...well made. The sheet and padding fit so nice..love it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful! I bought this as a gift for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! I bought this as a gift for a baby shower. I used it to display all the gifts and wrapped it up, mother and father to be loved it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: China

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, easy to move.
customer_reviews.text: Great basket for newborns, portable and very attractive. My grand daughter now uses it for her baby dolls to go to sleep. Long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine K. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: larger than expected, too big for my granddaughter to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The velcro didn't line up well on the top. The ribbon came apart. I really regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Schutte

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived...it's cute!
customer_reviews.text: We just received this moses basket yesterday. The bedding is a bit different than I expected - the sides are actually an embroidered polkadot with the waffle just on the bottom of the insert. Basic mattress pad. I am planning to make my own bedding from an easy tutorial I found online in addition to what we received. We are planning to use this with the Jolly Jumper stand which has not arrived yet!
customer_reviews.author: newbiemommie

customer_reviews.title: Wondrous
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect solution for my Great-Grandson who was born 2 mos. early at 3 lbs., 5 oz. When he came home in 3 weeks,, it was the perfect size to give him a confined sleeping space.. Very attractive and well constructed. Great buy for newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lou

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these and they have all been well constructed. Recommend this to anyone who is looking for a Moses basket.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Basket is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I just wish the hood attached another way other than hook and loop tape. The hood is very easily separated from the basket. Even ribbons holding it in place would have been better in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: KaSandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! A little longer than I expected but still a beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for babies who wiggle and roll
customer_reviews.text: Really flimsy but great for newborns who cant move much. Not suited for wiggly rolly babies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute for a picture, but not for the child to stay in there for more then 5 min
customer_reviews.author: arsela

customer_reviews.title: bought this with the stand and I love it! My baby is 3 months today and ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this with the stand and I love it! My baby is 3 months today and she is getting a little too big for it but it worked great up until then. She slept soundly and comfortably in it and I am definitely keeping it for baby #2 someday!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hass

customer_reviews.title: moses-in-a-basket Basket
customer_reviews.text: everyone at the shower loved the basket, especially mom to be. very lightweight, but very well constructed. perfect for new mom that's exhausted. mom can nap on the couch with baby very close by and not fuss with big heavy bassinette or up to the crib where mom can't hear. i put a couple outfits, diapers and a very cute teether blankie for baby boy;, in the basket. loved by all!!!! this basket comes with a mattress, 1 sheet and sage liner. beautiful. and VERY well priced!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Castle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for napping baby
customer_reviews.text: Im glad I purchased this. It's a perfect mobile bed for a baby when you don't want baby in a huge crib or far away from you. My Booba can sleep comfortably right next to me on the couch with this basket.
customer_reviews.author: gandsavior

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute and functionable baby bed. Great for my new great grandniece and a perfect fit for an infant.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Good without the hood
customer_reviews.text: I really like the basket itself, and the bedding stays in well even with constant moving around. The basket is a great size and sturdy; I just wish the hood were more secure. The velcro doesn't always keep it in place. I will probably end up using it without the hood for the most part since I don't want to deal with fixing it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Lover

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: We we'll see how the present works out at the baby shower. I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: bearhart

customer_reviews.title: Great basket but poor quality bedding
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a bed for our infant before she could roll over to save space in our little apartment. The basket itself is pretty sturdy and we're going to use it for our second child, but the sheet and bedding that came with it is really poor quality. I found some other sheets to use with it, but I'm going to have to make something to replace the sage gingham part because it's falling apart. I did wash it on the gentle cycle, though, so maybe it's my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Love it wish i could review a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love it wish i could review a full review but my baby baby wouldnt take to it at all. But my 1 year old is totally in love with this one lol
customer_reviews.author: MoonRose

customer_reviews.title: Love the moses basket
customer_reviews.text: Love the moses basket. My "go to" shower gift. Mom's love it for visiting. Great big basket to carry all the "necessaries" and baby always has an place to nap.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 4 Boyz

customer_reviews.title: These are great! We used ours constantly and have gifted a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We used ours constantly and have gifted a couple as baby shower presents. As far as I am concerned they are a must have for anyone expecting a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Traeling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this item. Beautiful. Easy to put together. Worth the price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: sewing4fun

customer_reviews.title: Precious
customer_reviews.text: So simple and beautiful, bought for my soon to be grandaughter, and I hope her mommy and daddy liked it as much as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an alternative to our swing for our newest addition to the family. Unlike her big sister, our new little one hates the swing with an absolute passion! This Moses Basket, however, she lays in and is actually content! It's wonderfully convenient and pretty, to boot! I'd definitely recommend this to any of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Clements

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful basket
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this basket!!! It was brought for my cousin's baby shower and it was a big it. Well made and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: The Velcro seems really cheap. I may remove it ...
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro seems really cheap. I may remove it and just tie it on or something... also, the bumper seems to small for the basket. Otherwise, very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Annerbelle

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed 5.00 would of been overpaid. Use it for grandaughter doll
customer_reviews.author: Glenda mcglasson

customer_reviews.title: I returned it once I saw it
customer_reviews.text: The main thing to consider with this basket is that it is cheap, at $40 I did expect it to be good enough to do the job, however, my husband and I thought it is very cheaply made and doesn't feel sturdy enough to use for years to come. The bonet attachment joins by Velcro which works but looks pretty tacky. It looks similar to the photo but obviously quality is not as good and Velcro is obvious when you put it together. It probably cost about $5 to make and is worth buying for maybe $15 if you're on a budget but I think it is overpriced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: nia

customer_reviews.title: and it was a great price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, and it was a great price
customer_reviews.author: Susan Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! Easy assembly, sturdy material and very spacious. It completed this very special shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Poor made!
customer_reviews.text: Poor made!! When we received this I was so disappointed. The hood Velcros on and didn't line up at all. Also the basket was lopsided. Thank God for prime and free returns.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany McGee

customer_reviews.title: the best baby basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. Used it continually for first 4 months of baby's life. Unfortunately the sides will suffer wear and tear and begin to break down.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son's new baby and it is a nice basket. The only thing I don't like is how the hood fits on but I see why it has to do that. It just doesn't look "finished" with it being on with velcro. It's a shower gift for them, so I hope they like it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Kissel

customer_reviews.title: Great for visiting family and friends
customer_reviews.text: I love the natural look and general comfort and safety for the baby when making visits. The quality of both the basket and liner are good and it will find further usage as toy storage when baby outgrows its use for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: lost reader

customer_reviews.title: It's cute but the measurements were off
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but the measurements were off and the mattress that comes with doesn't seem to fit in the basket, which is annoying. It's too late for me to return this since baby is on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: daughter love it
customer_reviews.text: She asked for a Moses basket. This is a great gift that people didn't know they still make great item
customer_reviews.author: NANAJ

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't as sturdy as o thought it would be one side was ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't as sturdy as o thought it would be one side was very lopsided when we received and didn't seem to safe to carry baby in
customer_reviews.author: Sam J Sally III

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as described. I really liked the hood piece being separate and secured with Velcro type latching. This made the basket easier to transport with gifts inside for the baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Siedle

customer_reviews.title: Great basket - don’t recommend the hood.
customer_reviews.text: Love the basket, but the way the hood attaches with Velcro is AWFUL. It looks bad and doesn’t really keep the hood on securely. We removed the velcro and will attach the hood another way if we even use it. Everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: The Basket was just fine but the hood part doesn't stay on super well ...
customer_reviews.text: The Basket was just fine but the hood part doesn't stay on super well and was rather out of shape from shipping. Baby slept great, though.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Braaten

customer_reviews.title: Missing part !!!
customer_reviews.text: Was so annoyed 😒, The good was missing, make sure you check!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super flimsy & cheap
customer_reviews.text: If i could give this a 0 star i would. Arrived Broken & SPLIT. I gave it a chance in spite of the low reviews and i really wanted to hqve tbis basket. It is absolutely poor quality. Save yourself the headache of buying and returning. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mosley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived bent and the way the hood attaches to the top is a bit cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Made a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a baby shower gift. The recipient was very excited to have the basket to be a portable bed in the early months. Later it will probably be storage and later maybe a play toy for dolls.
customer_reviews.author: brenna sundby

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and good backup
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Comes in handy when away from crib!
customer_reviews.author: Brittnie

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: The price was so good I did not expect such a nice set. I bought it from the "used" page. When it arrived it looked like it was brand new, never opened, everything in its original packaging. Just to buy a bumper pad alone was more expensive than this entire basket set. Had I bought this basket set at the "new" price, it still would only have been about the same price as a bumper set alone. The hood makes the basket look adorable, and offers some shade and protection from breezes. There are more expensive Moses baskets out there, but this one serves its purpose: it is cozy, safe, and comes in neutral colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M.

customer_reviews.title: optionial bassinet
customer_reviews.text: traditional bassinets take up so much room, so I decided to buy the Moses Basket with Hood instead. It will work out well with what little space we have.
customer_reviews.author: ickie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this and so did my baby.Nice and fast delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: andrea sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but I suppose someone could argue they could be a bit more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: used all the time
customer_reviews.text: This was so handy to carry our little one around in. He sleeps in it supervised during the day too. He is 3 months old now and we still use it. Deffinitly recommended for a new mom.
customer_reviews.author: dreamymia

product_meta.title: Hooded Baby Moses Basket with Liner, Sheet, and Pad
product_meta.description:
Badger Basket's pretty Hooded Moses Basket creates a sleeping space for your newborn anywhere in the house! Includes lightly padded fabric liner and a foam pad. Basket hood shades your baby, or remove it completely. Sturdy handles woven onto the basket. When Baby outgrows the Moses Basket, use it as a place for storing stuffed animals or linens, or as a bed for dolls or pets. Simple assembly required - attach hood and liner, no tools needed, illustrated instructions included. Basket is woven maize husk. Pad is polyurethane foam with a wipe-clean, PEVA (non-PVC) vinyl cover. Overall unit measures 31.5 inches L x 18.5 inches W x 18.5 inches H. Basket tapers from top to bottom and front to back. Basket bottom: 12 inches W x 27.5 inches L on outside and 11.5 inches W x 27 inches L on inside. Foam pad measures 26.5 inches L x 11.5 inches W x 1 inch H. Assembled product weight: 3.9 pounds. All measurements approximate. Basket is handmade and measurements vary slightly. Liner is removable and machine washable. Spot clean basket and hood as needed. Basket can be used until Baby is approximately 15 pounds (6.8 kg) or until Baby can push up or roll over unassisted, whichever limit comes first. Always place Moses Basket on a firm, flat surface. Never place it near the fireplace or open flames./!\ Not to be used to transport your baby. Never lift, move, or carry the basket with your baby inside. Complies with all current, applicable ASTM safety standards. Mattress pad manufactured with the maximum thickness allowable under current safety standards. Product includes a limited warranty of 30 Days Parts to the original owner. Props/accessories shown are for illustration purposes only and are not included with the product. Actual color/finish may vary slightly from screen display. Product details/features subject to change at any time without notice. Additional white sheets sold separately in packs of two (Badger Basket Model #00029).

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Keep your newborn comfortable and close-by at home or when visiting friends! Badger Basket’s pretty Hooded Moses Basket allows your infant to snooze near you wherever you are. Everything you need is in the box – basket, hood, and all of the bedding. No tools needed for assembly. Machine washable fabrics.
feature_bullets: A place for your newborn to sleep anywhere in the house
Includes the hooded basket, foam pad, fabric liner, and fitted sheet
Bedding is removable and machine washable
Overall unit measures 31.5 inches L x 18.5 inches W x 18.5 inches H
For use from birth through 15 pounds or when your infant can push up or roll over, whichever comes first
Not for use in the car and never carry the basket with your infant inside of it
